title: Governing body NPC congratulate elected members of Supreme Court Press Association
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 17 (APP):The governing body of the National Press Club (NPC) on Friday congratulated the newly elected officials of the Supreme Court Press Association for their victory in the 2025 elections.
The press release emphasised that the NPCâ€™s president, Azhar Jatoi, secretary, Nayyar Ali, finance secretary, Waqar Abbasi, and all members of the governing body have congratulated the newly elected officials of the Supreme Court Press Association for their victory in the 2025 elections.
The newly elected officials include President Zulqarnain Iqbal, Secretary General Ghulam Nabi Yousafzai, Finance Secretary Abrar Hussain Astori, Vice President Abid Araien, Secretary Information Ahmad Fouad, and governing body members Saharish Khan, Waseem Malik, and Nisar Abid.
NPC officials expressed confidence in the elected members and hoped that they would continue to play their role in resolving the issues faced by journalists all over the country and also promote the freedom of expression.
They also desired that the members should also work for the provision of speedy justice and free legal facilities to the journalists.
